metadata.title: CVE-2020-7010 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK) versions prior to 1.1.0 generatepasswords using a weak random number generator. If an attacker is able todetermine when the current Elastic Stack cluster was deployed they may beable to more easily brute force the Elasticsearch credentials generated byECK.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
